fr.istic.aoc.metronome

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.istic.aoc.metronome.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MEObserver, Observer, SliderObserver

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements MEObserver, SliderObserver
    Implementation of the MEObserver and SliderObserver. This class acts as a observer for the ME and Sliders. Initialize the ME instance with relative observers(Command objects) and provides the methods which control the Metronome.
    Author:
    Jiyoung Park

      • bpmSliderChanged

        public void bpmSliderChanged()
        Description copied from interface: SliderObserver
        Calls ME's setBPM method to : 1. change the bpm value 2. executes registered BpmChangedCmd (as a Observer) to signal the change to Controller 3. change timer's duration if the 'running' status is true
        Specified by:
        bpmSliderChanged in interface SliderObserver

      • measureSliderChanged

        public void measureSliderChanged()
        Description copied from interface: SliderObserver
        Calls ME's setMeasure method to : 1. change the measure value 2. executes registered MeasureChangedCmd (as a Observer) to signal the change to Controller
        Specified by:
        measureSliderChanged in interface SliderObserver
